main event: A large and bright object was detected on radar, lasting about 5 minutes before disappearing.
interesting points: The observation was conducted via ground radar., The sighting lasted for 32 minutes in total with the object visible for about 5 minutes., The radar scope indicated an object that was possibly a balloon or astronomical in nature., The sighting report included a witness, identified as a 33-year-old machine operator from Atlanta, Georgia who expressed fear and ran to her mother upon seeing the object., The elevation angle of the object was noted to be 42 degrees, close to the stars.
witness description: machine operator, age 33, from Atlanta, Georgia
